thread.title: Miss Malaysia pens sweet note to ‘roomie’ Maxine Medina
thread.title_full: Miss Malaysia pens sweet note to ‘roomie’ Maxine Medina

author: gcatolico
title: Miss Malaysia pens sweet note to ‘roomie’ Maxine Medina
text:
Miss Malaysia pens sweet note to ‘roomie’ Maxine Medina INQUIRER.net / 08:20 AM February 10, 2017 A photo posted by Miss Universe Malaysia 2016 🇲🇾 (@kiran_jassal) on Feb 6, 2017 at 7:11pm PST ADVERTISEMENT 
In response to Maxine Medina’s heartwarming post, Miss Universe Malaysia 2016 Kiran Jassal took to social media to send her love for her “roomie.” 
On Wednesday, Jassal posted her selfie with the Filipina beauty queen on Instagram with a special message for her. “Missing the roomie Maxine Medina,” she said. “24 K[arat] Magic will always hold a special place in my heart.” 
Likewise, Miss Universe USA Deshauna Barber also recalled her bonding times with Medina, Jassal, and Miss Universe Curacao Chanelle de Lau. 
“I miss my sisters,” she penned in the throwback post . A photo posted by Miss USA 2016 (@deshaunabarber) on Feb 7, 2017 at 3:06pm PST A photo posted by Maria Mika Maxine Medina (@maxine_medina) on Jan 18, 2017 at 1:13am PST 
Before flying to Brunei for a family outing, Medina, 26, penned a memorable shout-out to her roommate on the photo-sharing app and vowed to visit her soon. “I’m getting emotional when I saw this in my bag as I’m really missing my roommate. She’s the first person I always see in the morning and I’m always with when Miss Universe 2016 started,” she wrote. A photo posted by Maria Mika Maxine Medina (@maxine_medina) on Feb 2, 2017 at 8:39pm PST 
During the 65th Miss Universe pageant held last month at the SM Mall Of Asia Arena, Barber made it to the Top 9 cut, while Medina finished strong at the Top 6. Gianna Francesca Catolico
